name: obsidian-todo-extractor
description: Todo extractor plugin for Obsidian gathers your todos from your codebase and adds them to a note.

scripts.dev: tsc && bun run lint && NODE_ENV=development bun esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.build: tsc && bun run lint && bun esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: bun version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
